name: Chomp! (xHaoZhan)
description:
This is the prototype of the game idea. (Sorry for the ugly graphic and buggy mechanic lmao, its my first time creating game)

  • Eat the food.
  • Control the organ to digest the food.

Controls

  • Click and hold to eat the food.
  • Click to swallow the food down.
  • Hover to drag the shit out.
